languages.text: "Сай'лантреш обманчива и коварна... она проникает в душу исподволь, обещая ложное совершенство, завлекая в свои сети обещаниями порочного идеала. Правительница мон-кай, быть может, и не знает о том, что ее душа была осквернена".

traits.locale_text: "Сай'лантреш обманчива и коварна... она проникает в душу исподволь, обещая ложное совершенство, завлекая в свои сети обещаниями порочного идеала. Правительница мон-кай, быть может, и не знает о том, что ее душа была осквернена".

languages.text: "Sai'lanthresh is deceitful and cunning... She subtly penetrates the soul, offering false perfection, luring victims into her web with promises of a wicked ideal. The ruler of the mon-keigh perhaps does not even know that her soul has been corrupted."
languages.original_text: "Сай'лантреш обманчива и коварна... она проникает в душу исподволь, обещая ложное совершенство, завлекая в свои сети обещаниями порочного идеала. Правительница мон-кай, быть может, и не знает о том, что ее душа была осквернена".

traits.locale_text: "Sai'lanthresh is deceitful and cunning... She subtly penetrates the soul, offering false perfection, luring victims into her web with promises of a wicked ideal. The ruler of the mon-keigh perhaps does not even know that her soul has been corrupted."

"Sai'lanthresh is deceitful and cunning... She subtly penetrates the soul, offering false perfection, luring victims into her web with promises of a wicked ideal. The ruler of the mon-keigh perhaps does not even know that her soul has been corrupted."

"Sai'lanthresh is deceitful and cunning... She subtly penetrates the soul, offering false perfection, luring victims into her web with promises of a wicked ideal. The ruler of the mon-keigh perhaps does not even know that her soul has been corrupted."

"Sai'lanthresh is deceitful and cunning... She subtly penetrates the soul, offering false perfection, luring victims into her web with promises of a wicked ideal. The ruler of the mon-keigh perhaps does not even know that her soul has been corrupted."

languages.text: 「セランスレッシュは狡猾にして巧妙…。ひそやかに魂へと入り込んでは見せかけの完璧さを与え、邪悪な理想を約束して獲物を網におびき寄せる。モン＝ケイの支配者は、その魂が腐らされていることに気づいてさえいないだろう」
languages.original_text: "Sai'lanthresh is deceitful and cunning... She subtly penetrates the soul, offering false perfection, luring victims into her web with promises of a wicked ideal. The ruler of the mon-keigh perhaps does not even know that her soul has been corrupted."

traits.locale_text: 「セランスレッシュは狡猾にして巧妙…。ひそやかに魂へと入り込んでは見せかけの完璧さを与え、邪悪な理想を約束して獲物を網におびき寄せる。モン＝ケイの支配者は、その魂が腐らされていることに気づいてさえいないだろう」

languages.text: “赛·兰斯雷什奸诈而狡猾……她会巧妙地渗透到他人的灵魂之中，提供虚假的完美愿景，以充满邪恶愿景的承诺引诱受害者上钩。或许猴子们的统治者自己都没有意识到，她的灵魂已然遭到了腐化。”
languages.original_text: "Sai'lanthresh is deceitful and cunning... She subtly penetrates the soul, offering false perfection, luring victims into her web with promises of a wicked ideal. The ruler of the mon-keigh perhaps does not even know that her soul has been corrupted."

traits.locale_text: “赛·兰斯雷什奸诈而狡猾……她会巧妙地渗透到他人的灵魂之中，提供虚假的完美愿景，以充满邪恶愿景的承诺引诱受害者上钩。或许猴子们的统治者自己都没有意识到，她的灵魂已然遭到了腐化。”

languages.text: «Sai'lanthresh es astuta y embustera... Se introduce sutilmente en tu alma, ofreciéndote una falsa perfección, atrayendo a sus víctimas hacia su telaraña con promesas de un ideal perverso. Es posible que la soberana mon-keigh ni siquiera se haya percatado de la corrupción que ha anidado en su alma».
languages.original_text: "Sai'lanthresh is deceitful and cunning... She subtly penetrates the soul, offering false perfection, luring victims into her web with promises of a wicked ideal. The ruler of the mon-keigh perhaps does not even know that her soul has been corrupted."

traits.locale_text: «Sai'lanthresh es astuta y embustera... Se introduce sutilmente en tu alma, ofreciéndote una falsa perfección, atrayendo a sus víctimas hacia su telaraña con promesas de un ideal perverso. Es posible que la soberana mon-keigh ni siquiera se haya percatado de la corrupción que ha anidado en su alma».

languages.text: "Sai'lanthresh ist hinterhältig und raffiniert ... Sie durchdringt subtil die Seele, bietet falsche Perfektion an, lockt Opfer mit Versprechungen eines bösen Ideals in ihr Netz. Vielleicht weiß die Herrscherin der Chem-Pan-Sey gar nicht, dass ihre Seele verderbt wurde."
languages.original_text: "Sai'lanthresh is deceitful and cunning... She subtly penetrates the soul, offering false perfection, luring victims into her web with promises of a wicked ideal. The ruler of the mon-keigh perhaps does not even know that her soul has been corrupted."

traits.locale_text: "Sai'lanthresh ist hinterhältig und raffiniert ... Sie durchdringt subtil die Seele, bietet falsche Perfektion an, lockt Opfer mit Versprechungen eines bösen Ideals in ihr Netz. Vielleicht weiß die Herrscherin der Chem-Pan-Sey gar nicht, dass ihre Seele verderbt wurde."

languages.text: « Sai'lanthresh est déloyale et fourbe... Elle s'infiltre imperceptiblement dans l'âme de ses victimes, elle leur offre une fausse perfection et les attire dans sa toile en leur promettant un idéal malsain. La dirigeante des mon-keigh n'est peut-être même pas consciente qu'elle a été corrompue. »
languages.original_text: "Sai'lanthresh is deceitful and cunning... She subtly penetrates the soul, offering false perfection, luring victims into her web with promises of a wicked ideal. The ruler of the mon-keigh perhaps does not even know that her soul has been corrupted."

traits.locale_text: « Sai'lanthresh est déloyale et fourbe... Elle s'infiltre imperceptiblement dans l'âme de ses victimes, elle leur offre une fausse perfection et les attire dans sa toile en leur promettant un idéal malsain. La dirigeante des mon-keigh n'est peut-être même pas consciente qu'elle a été corrompue. »

languages.text: "Sai'lanthresh hilekâr ve kurnazdır... Ruha sinsice nüfuz eder, sahte bir başarı hissi sunar ve çarpık bir ülkü vaadiyle kurbanları ağına çeker. Mon-keigh hükümdarı, belki de ruhunun yozlaştığının bile farkında değil."
languages.original_text: "Sai'lanthresh is deceitful and cunning... She subtly penetrates the soul, offering false perfection, luring victims into her web with promises of a wicked ideal. The ruler of the mon-keigh perhaps does not even know that her soul has been corrupted."

traits.locale_text: "Sai'lanthresh hilekâr ve kurnazdır... Ruha sinsice nüfuz eder, sahte bir başarı hissi sunar ve çarpık bir ülkü vaadiyle kurbanları ağına çeker. Mon-keigh hükümdarı, belki de ruhunun yozlaştığının bile farkında değil."
